amendment.description: To make funds available for a United States contribution to UNAIDS.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2001 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2001 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy. (consideration: CR S13365) To make funds available for a United States contribution to UNAIDS.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2001 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2001 proposed by Senator Reid for Senator Leahy.
